remarks: The symbol at index 0 of a cyclically shifted nonempty word is the symbol at index N of the original word.  (Contributed by AV, 15-May-2018.) (Revised by AV, 21-May-2018.)  (Revised by AV, 30-Oct-2018.)
statement: cshwidx0 $p |- ( ( W e. Word V /\ N e. ( 0 ..^ ( # ` W ) ) ) -> ( ( W cyclShift N ) ` 0 ) = ( W ` N ) ) $.
